thread.title: World Ski Awards continues successful Leitner, Prinoth, and Demaclenko partnerships
thread.title_full: World Ski Awards continues successful Leitner, Prinoth, and Demaclenko partnerships

title: World Ski Awards continues successful Leitner, Prinoth, and Demaclenko partnerships
text: The world’s best ski tourism organisations will be rewarded for the third time at the World Ski Awards 2015 next month; a high-calibre competition that sets the standards in global winter tourism. This year, the event is being held from November 20th-22nd in Kitzbühel. The Leitner Group - with Leitner ropeways, Prinoth, and Demaclenko - has been a partner since 2014 and will return again this year, with the evening providing an excellent opportunity for the company to highlight its le
